column1: # This file defines which ZAP rules to run during security scans
# Format: Rule ID, Action (IGNORE, INFO, WARN, FAIL)
# FAIL = Fail the scan if this rule triggers
# High priority security rules - FAIL on detection
# Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) rules - FAIL on detection
# OWASP Top 10 compliance - FAIL for critical, WARN for others
